head.title: What's on Today's Menu
head.text: Occasional updates and press from the TV Kitchen team.

paragraphs.text: Welcome to the first in an occasional series of updates from TV Kitchen, an open source project that gives you tools to take TV streams and turn them into structured data–such as captions–to power media analysis, fact-checks, investigative research, and more.
Local television news still attracts some 20 million nightly…
